[{"idReadable":"P-370","updated":1666627198622,"resolved":null,"summary":"Include PTO in Payment","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

dev notes:

  • Remove writing PTO result into SS

DOD

  • Payments Amount contains PTO compensation
  • PTOs are calculated for the period from 01/01/{currentYear} to the end of the month in a given date
  • PTO compensation are added to the Payment Amount only if the month is December

{"idReadable":"P-189","updated":1666600778017,"resolved":null,"summary":"Allow to select date for displayed Payments","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD:

  1. DatePicker is present on top of Payments' page
  2. When the date is changed, numbers in Payments are recalculated immediately in accordance to selected date

dev notes:

  1. selected date is sent on backend -> get Payments between start of date's month and end of date's month ? return them : calculate payments
  2. use DatePicker from ia-react-template

{"idReadable":"P-414","updated":1666600117548,"resolved":null,"summary":"Generate PTO based on active Users","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD

  • PTOs are generated based on active users for now
  • PTOs are generated with no relation to users list in spreadsheet
  • New User in the system generates new PTO
  • Archiving of the User on the users service removes its PTO from the PTO list

dev notes:

  • calculate PTO for a single (active) user instead of calculating for "all active users at a time"

{"idReadable":"P-402","updated":1666351395995,"resolved":null,"summary":"Generate payments list based on active Staffers","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD:

  • Payments are generated based on active users for now
  • Payments are generated with no relation to users list in spreedsheet
  • New User in the system generates new Payment
  • Archiving of the User on the users service makes it not possible to generate Payment for them

Status","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"attachments":[],"comments":[],"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD:

  • Dependency with Payment Status are removed
  • Payments' persistence on GET endpoint is removed
  • Payments' closing flow is updated
  • Open payments are deleted in DBs on qa,stage,prod envs

dev notes:

  • send List<Payment> as closePayments method's payload

DOD:

  • only one user-month pair for Wage is allowed
